summary: All three requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is addressed in Hero.tsx (creator tagline), About.tsx (brand copy crediting Arpan Ghosh), and Footer.tsx (brand tagline). REQ-2 is addressed in Contact.tsx (primary + alternative phone as tel: links) and Footer.tsx (both numbers as tel: links). REQ-3 is addressed in CheckoutModal.tsx (UPI_ID constant set to '6294577453@ybl'). No missing requirements or hallucinated features were detected.
